MUTABLE GRIDS



#1
T WRAP + T 1 0 15
L 0 2: SCRIPT 2

#2
J PN X + T * Y 16
CV + I 1 0
K - 31 & 31 RSH J * I 5
IF GTE K G.FDR.V I: BREAK
TR.P + I 1
CV + I 1 ? LT K 4 16383 0

#3
T 15

#4
X - G.BTNX 8
Y G.BTNY
G.GBTN.V 1 0
G.BTNV 15
X RSH X 1
Y RSH Y 1

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M

#I
PARAM.SCALE 0 31
L 1 4: TR.TIME I 20
G.RST
G.FDX 0 0 0 2 8 1 2 0 3 1
L 0 2: G.GFDR.RN 0 0 31
G.GBX 1 0 8 0 1 1 0 4 4 8 8

#P
